homepage.intro: Hello, I'm Artur Marbach, a frontend developer from Hamburg, Germany. Welcome to my homepage! Passionate about creative solutions, I'm committed to continuous development in web development. With a keen interest in technology and a drive to deepen my skills, I aim to craft innovative and user-friendly websites.
Enthusiasm: With a broad knowledge base and passion for web development, I offer a fresh perspective and strong willingness to learn. Determined to further develop my skills, I'm eager tocollaborate on tailored solutions supporting your company goals
Commitment: As an aspiring web developer, I bring a unique perspective and unwavering commitment to quality. With a drive to learn new technologies and develop myself, I'm confident in making a valuable contribution to your digital projects.
Skill Development: I have grown my frontend developments skills that have allowed me toc reate different real projects.
Portfolio: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
development1.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories
development2.description: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on a object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and bottles to fight against the killer chicken
Communication: Contact me throug this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
